author: bayard
msg: Adding Michael Wooten's event support utilities from LANG-580

author: lektran
msg: Setting the request-map/security element's direct-request attribute to false was only working if a default-request was present.  Reported by Wai in OFBIZ-3861 and fixed using a variation of the patch that he supplied.

author: bayard
msg: Applying Sean Mickey's patch to LANG-630 such that MutableObject.equals is as would be expected. Now it directly overrides the equals(Object) method.
